Description:
Outstanding Quality in Curlewis Parks
Located in the beautiful Curlewis Parks Estate, 8 Longwood Street is the perfect opportunity for you to buy into the booming Curlewis housing market. This four bedroom 2 bathroom home offers 24 squares of living on a 398sqm smart block, which would suit a retired couple or a busy family on the go. Built 2 years ago, the home is in immaculate condition with bright living spaces throughout. The main bedroom at the front of the home includes walk in robe and full ensuite while the other 3 bedrooms have built in robes. The stylish kitchen features a walk in pantry and island bench with Caesar stone bench tops that overlooks the open plan living/dining. A separate lounge area provides the perfect combination of parents/children's quarters for all the family to enjoy. Without a doubt, 8 Longwood Street is one of the finest quality homes in Curlewis Parks and is the perfect entertainer. If youâ??re looking to move to take advantage of all that Bellarine has to offer with award winning wineries and restaurants close by, multiple options of schools, shopping centres and amenities then an inspection is a must.
Insights: 8 Longwood Street, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
“Gunyah” - panoramic beauty with room to spread your wings
Setting the scene with a stunning outlook across Port Phillip Bay, the You Yangs, Melbourne city skyline and the Bellarine, this beautifully orientated, split level property set on 1.46 ha – 3.60 acres approx, gives you the opportunity to enjoy views for life.
Entering the ambient lounge area with open fireplace and north facing windows embracing the bay outlook, you will be left speechless. The functional hub of the kitchen, dining and second living space is where the action is, complete with distracting panoramic views traversing along the entire north face of this part of the home.
Access your sizeable land space through sliding doors conveniently placed off this zone, where it’s up to you how you utilise the outdoors. Tennis Court? Swimming Pool (STCA). The options are limited by your own imagination however, get ready to immediately play host within an enviable, undercover alfresco area. Protected from the elements on three sides makes this huge outdoor room a viable entertaining option all year long.
All 3 bedrooms are generous in size, the master suite placed separately with ensuite and walk-in robe. Well equipped laundry with direct access to the rear patio, split system air conditioning and gas log fire.
A DLUG and extra shedding placed to the rear of the property, contains ample storage room/workshop and completes this lifestyle equation. Fruit and olive trees will keep you busy at harvest, afterwards relax in your very own sauna. There are simply too many features to list, inspect this property to realise its full potential!
Insights: 165 Hermsley Road, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 14 other 3 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Ready to build on
Measuring 447 sqm with a 14 metre frontage and 32 metres deep this is an opportunity for you to build your dream home.
Fully fenced, set amongst quality homes within 2 minutes walk of the Curlewis Shopping Centre offering Woolworths, medical centre, pharmacy & cafe.
National Broadband Network ready (NBN) Being connected is a big part of today's world, homes in this area are already connected to high speed internet.
This area has fantastic parklands with new & modern play equipment just a short stroll away.
There is now access to walk down to Corio Bay.
Close to Clifton Springs Primary School, boat ramp, golf & bowls clubs. Easy access to Geelong via Portarlington Road.
This is an opportunity to acquire a larger block of land in a well established modern estate.

Description:
Premium Coastal Location
Ideally located in one of the Bellerine's newest estates and comprising of many features to suit all range of buyers. Only minutes from all Drysdale has on offer and a short 20 minute drive back to Geelong CBD. The home holds great aspects and also captures great natural light with 4 spacious bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite, formal living upon entry that flows through to the open plan kitchen meals and family room. A second central bathroom with separate toilet services the rest of the home. The back yard is neat and perfect for those who want low maintenance but still some room to move. Added extras include BIR's, ducted heating, split system A/C, 900mm stainless steel oven and 5 burner cooktop, WIP, internal access from the DLUG and spacious undercover decking area for all year round entertainment. Moments from some of the best schools, wineries and cafes the Bellerine has on offer and also enjoy the ocean air as you are walking distance to the water. Call today for more information.

Description:
Large family home on 6.5 acres in Curlewis
North facing rendered brick home featuring two separate wings.
The West wing comprises a large living room with a bar and a built in wood heater, formal dining room, study and master bedroom with walk through robe and en-suit with spa bath.
The East wing has a large living/games room, two large bedrooms with built in robes and a bathroom.
In between there is an open planned black-wood kitchen/meals area with wood-heater and walk in pantry plus two bedrooms with a shared bathroom.
All main areas are serviced by reverse cycle air conditioners.
All living areas are North facing, taking advantage of the winter sun for heating, with views of the pool area and the garden.
Attached is a large two car garage with laundry and workshop.
The house has both solar hot-water and photo voltaic cells.
The outdoor entertainment area has a kidney shaped
50 000L saltwater pool and spa.
A four car shed plus a stable with tack-room and workshop close to main building.
The property has mature garden with established natives and fruit trees.
The property has 3 paddocks and 3 horse yards with shelters.
Located15 minutes from the CBD of Geelong which allows easy access to some of Australia’s finest private schooling and 1 hour drive from Melbourne. The property is centrally located to the entire Bellarine Peninsula, 2 minutes from ‘Curlewis Golf Club, 10 minute walk to the beachfront and bay, easy access via Ferry to the Mornington Peninsula within 1 hour.
Insights: 71-79 Navarre Road, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Modern Living - Room For The Caravan or Boat!
Built in 2013, this home offers an ultra-modern lifestyle with all the benefits of courtyard living.
Inside features a spacious open plan kitchen, dining and lounge area. The modern kitchen features ample cupboard storage space and island bench overlooking the dining area. The home also includes three good sized bedrooms plus office/rumpus. All bedrooms with built-in robes and main with walk-in robe and ensuite. Main bathroom with vanity, shower and bath. Laundry with outside access and storage cupboards.
Outside, sliding doors open out to the outdoor entertaining area perfect for entertaining family and friends. Easy care garden, solar power, side access - ideal for a boat or caravan and a double garage under the main roof with internal access.
Situated on a 501m2 allotment in the exciting new development of Curlewis, close to all amenities including schooling, Clifton Springs Boat Ramp and only 20 minutes from Geelong. This extremely well presented home could be the lifestyle you've always wanted. Inspection a must!
Tim Cain : 0429 067 808

Description:
Stage 3 Coriyule Estate- 560m2.
No frustrating restrictions. The Coriyule Estate Curlewis is located on the Bellarine Peninsula just 17kms from Geelong CBD and within close proximity to beaches, wineries, and all the amenities that this wonderful area has to offer. The Bellarine rail trail is also right on your door step and the Clifton Springs marina is a short distance down the road. Our estate gives you the freedom to create without the frustrating restrictions developers often place on the new estates. The National Broadband Network (NBN) is in the Coriyule Estate to provide you with highest quality internet experience. This exciting release of land is now available with a range of block sizes. Secure your future home site today.

Description:
Exceptional Family Living
Primely situated in the most exclusive subdivision in Curlewis, this contemporary three bedroom gem is located only a few hundred metres from the bay, walking tracks and offers not only lifestyle but absolute comfort.
Finished in neutral tones and with windows aplenty, the sun filled spacious living area is partially cordoned off from the open plan kitchen and dining area, making it the perfect place to escape and unwind at the end of the day.
The kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, substantial breakfast bench, quality fixtures and large walk in pantry, making it an ideal space for preparing meals and entertaining.
Featuring three sizeable bedrooms with BIR's and spacious master with WIR plus ensuite, this is the perfect family home.
This is truly a comfortable home to live in with ducted gas heating, providing warmth when necessary.
The remote double lock up garage with internal access also offers a drive through roller door to an additional space for your caravan or boat!
Outside, you'll be greeted by the meticulously landscaped and easily maintained back garden, compete with delightful entertaining area.
If you're looking for a move in ready home with the laid back and coastal lifestyle at your fingertips, then look no further than 22 Bonavista Way!
Luke Campbell : 0409 554 949
Insights: 22 Bonavista Way, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 14 other 3 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
Convenient Location, New Estate
Looking for a place that enables you to have all you need to live, work and play then Curlewis will tick those boxes. Becoming a suburb of choice because of it's close proximity to the new Woolworth's complex, schools, bike trails, boat ramp etc. An area that meets all your daily requirements plus your relaxation ones. Close at hand are an array of restaurants, cafes to enjoy that down time we all so desperately need. This home has separate living zones. Great family property that would also suit the night shift worker as the main bedroom is at the back of the home away from the noise. A blank canvas for your own stamp on the outdoor area, just waiting for the right person to establish that entertainment space for family and friends to enjoy.Would also suit an astute investor who sees the potential for growth in this area over the coming years.Only 20 minutes from Geelong it is a quiet location to relax after a hard day.
Insights: 14 other 3 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
A 'Lumford' Gem!
Set within one of the most sought after pockets of Curlewis is this charming flat block of land which is ready to be built on and be another quality home within a lovely established street. Within a stone's throw to some exceptional parks and reserves, walking distance to the ever growing Curlewis retail hub, well equipped public transport, close proximity to some great schools and the vibrant winery/restaurant/cafe culture. This block showcases the enviable lifestyle that the Bellarine Peninsula offers and what's more some great neighbouring beaches and excellent boating facilities simply top the cake. A great opportunity to build your dream today and a wonderful investment opportunity for the future.
Insights: 6 Lumford Street, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Forget the hassle of building and move right in!
This near-new home in the popular suburb of Curlewis is situated at the top end of Creekside Drive, just over 250m from the brand new Curlewis shopping centre, which is set to be an upcoming retail hub of the Bellarine, as well as being within walking distance to the Parklands and beaches that the area is so well known for.
Equally appealing to the family, couple or investor ? 63 Creekside has something for everybody. The home is characterised by 4 spacious bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, including ensuite and walk-in wardrobe in the master bedroom. This practical home also has two distinct living areas, two bathrooms, a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and large double garage with internal and backyard access.
Some extra features of this home include an undercover outdoor alfresco area perfect for summer entertaining, ducted heating throughout, split-system air conditioning and a fresh coat of paint throughout to add to the new feel of the home. This is great value buying in a highly desirable location, and would suit a wide range of buyers including families, retirees, couples and the clever investor who sees future growth in years to come.
Insights: 63 Creekside Drive, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.
